data.title: Noam Chomsky turns 93 today. Born December 7th, 1928, @avramnoamchomsky is an esteemed American linguist, philosopher, and professor. In...
data.meta_description:
366 likes, 10 comments - talkeasypod on December 7, 2021: "Noam Chomsky turns 93 today.

Born December 7th, 1928, @avramnoamchomsky is an esteemed American linguist, philosopher, and professor. 

In April and November of 2020, Professor Chomsky sat with @samfragoso. He discussed the Trump administrationâ€™s response to the pandemic, lessons from historian Howard Zinn, the evolution of activism, and much more.

This Sunday, he returns to reflect on 2021.".
